column2: "Nna Josua frɛɛ Reubenfo
column3: Gadfo
column4: nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no
column7: Hom edzi dza EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses dze hyɛɛ hom no nyinara do
column8: na hom etsie me ndze wɔ dza mehyɛɛ hom nyinara mu:"

column2: "hom nndaan hom nuanom nngyaa hɔ nda pii yi dze bodu ndɛ da yi
column3: mbom hom edzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm no do."

column2: "Na afei EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze ahomgye ama hom nuanom
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn no: dɛm ntsi afei hom ndzi ndan
column4: na hom nkɔ hom asesee mu wɔ hom kyɛfa asaase a EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses dze maa hom wɔ Jordan egya no."

column2: "Yie nko ara na hom nhwɛ ndzi mbrasɛm nye mbra no a EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses dze hyɛɛ hom
column3: dɛ hom ndɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column4: na hom nnantsew n’akwan nyinara mu
column5: na hom ndzi ne mbransɛm nyinara do
column7: na hom mfa hom akoma nyinara nye hom kra nyinara nsom no no do."

column2: "Nna Josua hyiraa hɔn
column3: na ogyaa hɔn kwan: na wosii mu kɔr hɔn asesee mu."

column2: "Afei Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa kor no nna Moses ama hɔn egyapadze wɔ Basan: na ɔfa kor no so Josua maa hɔn bi wɔ hɔn nuanom mu wɔ Jordan egya anee afamu. Na aber a Josua rigya hɔn kwan ma wɔaakɔ hɔn asesee mu no
column3: ohyiraa hɔn
column12: na ntar piigyan na hom mfa nsan nkɔ hom asesee mu; na hom nye hom nuanom nkyɛ hom atamfo asadze no."

column2: "Na Reubenmba
column3: Gadmba nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no sanee
column4: na wofii Israelmba no nkyɛn wɔ Siloh a ɔwɔ Keenan asaase do sii mu kɔree
column6: wɔ hɔn enyadze asaase a woekenya no do
column7: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm a ɔnam Moses nsa do no tse no."

column2: "Na aber a wodur Jordan ho mbew a ɔwɔ Keenan asaase do no do no
column3: Reubenmba nye Gadmba nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no sii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ
column4: afɔrmbukyia a wɔhwɛ a ɔso a."

column2: "Na Israelmba nkaa no tsee dɛ wɔ dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: Reubenmba
column5: Gadmba nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no esi afɔrmbukyia wɔ Keenan asaase enyim tsentsendo
column6: wɔ Jordan ho mbew no do
column7: wɔ afa a ɔyɛ Israelmba afamu dze no do."

column2: "Na aber a Israelmba no tsee no
column3: hɔn nyinara poon hɔnho hyiae wɔ Siloh
column4: dɛ wontu hɔn do sa."

column2: "Na Israelmba no somaa ɔsɔfo Eleazar babanyin Finehas ma ɔkɔr Reubenmba
column3: Gadmba
column4: nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no hɔ

column2: "na mbapɔmba du ka no ho
column3: Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu egya fie ɔbapɔmba kor; na hɔn nyinara yɛ egyanom efiefi do etsitsir wɔ Israel mpempem no mu."

column2: "Na wɔbaa Reubenmba
column3: Gadmba
column4: nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no nkyɛn
column8: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE no dɔm nyina se nye yi
column9: Ebɛn mfom na hom dze afom Israel Nyankopɔn yi
column10: dɛ ndɛ da yi hom adan efi EWURADZE ekyir dzi
column11: wɔ dɛ hom esi afɔrmbukyia ama homho
column12: dze retsew EWURADZE do etua yi?"

column2: "Ana Peor emumuyɛ no a ɔdze ɔhaw baa EWURADZE no dɔm do ma mpo ɔdze bodu ndɛ da yi ara hɛn ho nntsew wɔ mu no
column3: suar dodoodow ma hɛn
column5: "ma ntsi ndɛ da yi hom adan efi EWURADZE ekyir dzi yi? Na ɔbɛba dɛ ɔnam dɛ hom retsew EWURADZE do etua ndɛ da yi ntsi
column6: ɔkyena no bo bofuw Israelmba no nyina."

column2: "Naaso sɛ hom enyadze asaase no ho nntsew a
column3: ɔno hom ntwa mbra EWURADZE enyadze asaase a EWURADZE ntamadan si do no do
column4: na wɔmbɛfa bi wɔ hɛn mu: na mbom mma hom nntsew etua wɔ hɛn do so
column5: dɛ homara so risi afɔrmbukyia aka EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn n’afɔrmbukyia no ho."

column2: "Ana nnyɛ Akan
column3: Zera babanyin no
column4: na ɔfomee wɔ adze a wɔadom no no mu
column5: na ebufuw baa Israelmba no nyinara do no bi? Ana Akan no nkotsee na owui wɔ n’emumuyɛ no mu?"

column2: "Nna Reubenmba
column3: Gadmba nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no buaa Israel mpempem mu etsitsir no dɛ
column10: na Israel so bohu; sɛ ɔyɛ etuatsew mu o
column11: sɛ mfom a yɛafom EWURADZE mu o
column12: mma ɔwo nngye hɛn nkwa ndɛ da yi
column14: "dɛ yeesi afɔrmbukyia ama hɛnho dɛ yɛdze bɛdan efi EWURADZE ekyir dzi; anaadɛ yɛbɔbɔ do ɔhyew afɔr anaa edziban afɔr
column15: anaa yɛbɔbɔ do asomdwee okum afɔr a

column2: "na sɛ mbom nnyɛ ahwɛyie bi ntsi
column3: na asɛm bi ntsi na yɛayɛ iyi a
column4: dɛ
column5: Daakye bi hom mba bɛka akyerɛ hɛn mba dɛ

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze Jordan ayɛ ɔhe ato hɛn nye hom
column3: Reubenmba nye Gadmba ntamu; hom nnyi kyɛfa wɔ EWURADZE mu: dɛm na hom mba bɛyɛ hɛn mba ma woeegyaa EWURADZE suro."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na yɛsee dɛ
column3: Wɔmma afei yensiesie hɛnho nsi afɔrmbukyia mma hɛnho
column4: nnyɛ ɔhyew afɔr
column5: na nnyɛ okum afɔr so ntsi a:"

column2: "na mbom dɛ ɔnyɛ dase wɔ hɛn nye hom ntamu
column3: nye hɛn mbasantsen a wobedzi hɛn ekyir no ntamu
column4: na yɛdze hɛn ɔhyew afɔr
column7: ayɛ EWURADZE edwuma no wɔ n’enyim; amma daakye bi hom mba aannse hɛn mba dɛ
column8: Hom nnyi kyɛfa wɔ EWURADZE mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na yɛsee dɛ
column3: Ɔbɛba dɛ
column4: sɛ daakye bi wɔse hɛn anaa hɛn mbasantsen dɛm a
column6: Hom nhwɛ EWURADZE afɔrmbukyia no ne saso a hɛn egyanom yɛe
column8: na nnyɛ okum afɔr so ntsi; mbom ɔyɛ dase wɔ hɛn nye hom ntamu."

column2: "Nyame mpa ngu dɛ yɛbɛtsew etua wɔ EWURADZE do
column3: na yɛadan efi EWURADZE ekyir dzi ndɛ da yi
column4: dɛ yebesi afɔrmbukyia abɔ do ɔhyew afɔr
column7: aka EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn afɔrmbukyia a ɔwɔ ne ntamadan no enyim no ho."

column2: "Na aber a ɔsɔfo Finehas
column3: nye Israelmba no mu mbapɔmba no
column4: mekyerɛ mpempem mu etsitsir a wɔka no ho no
column5: tsee nsɛm a Reubenmba nye Gadmba nye Manaasɛmba no kae no

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Eleazar ne babanyin Finehas see Reubenmba nye Gadmba
column3: nye Manaasɛmba no dɛ
column4: Ndɛ da yi na yeehu dɛ EWURADZE wɔ hom finimfin
column5: osiandɛ hom mmfaa mfom yi mmfoom EWURADZE: afei na hom eyi Israelmba no efi EWURADZE nsamu."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Eleazar ne babanyin Finehas
column3: nye mbapɔmba no
column4: sanee fi Reubenmba
column5: nye Gadmba no nkyɛn wɔ Gilead asaase do

column2: "Na asɛm no yɛɛ Israelmba enyisɔ; na Israelmba hyiraa Nyankopɔn
column3: na wɔannka bio dɛ worutu hɔn do sa
column4: wɔakɛsɛɛ asaase a Reubenmba nye Gadmba tse do no."

column2: "Na Reubenmba nye Gadmba frɛɛ afɔrmbukyia no Ed: Na
column3: wɔsee dɛ
column4: ɔyɛ hɛn ntamu dase dɛ EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn."
